name: Sherlocks Logic Puzzles p
description:
If you are a Sherlock Holmes fan these logic puzzles center around Holmes and Watson. If you like logic puzzles that tell a story, that center around a central theme so that you can feel you are working in an imaginary world, this is the classic logic puzzle set for you.

There is a special Bonus feature for those who can solve all the puzzles. A Sherlock Holmes Story (Pastiche) "The Adventure of Miss Stephanie Ray" will be unlocked if you can solve them all.

This isn't that easy a task. Lady Pemberton's Ghosts is a simple one, with a rating of "**", but they vary in complexity with the Five Pipe Problem being a puzzle it took the computer 6 runs to solve.

Difficulty Ratings by the way, are based on how many runs it took the computer to solve the puzzle.
